subtitleNullable: A collection of parsed Kurdish news in CKB
descriptionNullable:
# Kurdish News

https://github.com/0xdolan/kurdish_news

## Kurdish News text corpus parsed from:

- [NRT](http://www.nrttv.com) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [Westga News](http://www.westganews.net) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [NNSROJ](http://www.nnsroj.com/) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [Peyam](http://payam.tv/) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [PUK Media](https://www.pukmedia.com) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [Kurdistan Post](https://www.kurdistanpost.nu) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [ANF - Sorani](https://anfsorani.com/) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [AsoSoft Text Corpus](https://github.com/AsoSoft/AsoSoft-Text-Corpus) - Arabic-based alphabet  (CKB)

## Kurdish Text Corpus

All the text data will be merged, normalized, and sorted and will be publish in below repo (thanks to Dr. @layik):

- https://github.com/layik/kurdi
title: Kurdish News - CKB

# Kurdish News

https://github.com/0xdolan/kurdish_news

## Kurdish News text corpus parsed from:

- [NRT](http://www.nrttv.com) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [Westga News](http://www.westganews.net) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [NNSROJ](http://www.nnsroj.com/) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [Peyam](http://payam.tv/) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [PUK Media](https://www.pukmedia.com) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [Kurdistan Post](https://www.kurdistanpost.nu) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [ANF - Sorani](https://anfsorani.com/) - Arabic-based alphabet (CKB)
- [AsoSoft Text Corpus](https://github.com/AsoSoft/AsoSoft-Text-Corpus) - Arabic-based alphabet  (CKB)

## Kurdish Text Corpus

All the text data will be merged, normalized, and sorted and will be publish in below repo (thanks to Dr. @layik):

- https://github.com/layik/kurdi
